#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int pre[4000001];
char s[4000001];
//char t[400000];
//char text[4000000];
int main()
{
	//freopen("t.txt","r",stdin);
	//printf("HI\n");
	int i=1,k,n;
	fflush(stdin);	
	scanf("%s",s);
	fflush(stdin);
	//char *ch="0'";
	//strcpy(t,ch);
	//strcat(t,s);
	//strcpy(t,s);
	while((strcmp(s,"End")))
	{
	n=strlen(s);
	pre[1] = 0;  // by the definition of the problem
   	 for ( i = 2; i <= n; ++ i)
	 {
      	  k = pre[i - 1];
        	while (k != 0 && s[k] != s[i-1])
	 {
            k = pre[k];
        }
        if (s[k] == s[i-1])
	 {
            pre[i] = k + 1;
        }
	 else
	 {
            pre[i] = 0; // all failed
        }
    	}
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	printf("%d ",pre[i]);
	printf("\n");
	fflush(stdin);
	scanf("%s",s);
	fflush(stdin);
	}
	return 0;
}
